author: jphalip
message: Removed a colloquialism ("and then some") from the documentation index page that would be confusing to non-native English speakers.

files.patch:
@@ -5,7 +5,7 @@
 Django documentation
 ====================
 
-.. rubric:: Everything you need to know about Django (and then some).
+.. rubric:: Everything you need to know about Django.
 
 Getting help
 ============
